evidence.source_document: Memorandum in Support of Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: In early April, Defendant DOGE tried to destroy the longstanding statutory partnership ("Federal State Partnership") between the National Endowment for Humanities ("NEH") and fifty-six state and jurisdictional humanities councils (the "Councils") by terminating all grants to the Councils while simultaneously dismantling the agency, including the very office designed to support the Federal State Partnership.

extracted.value: In early April, Defendant DOGE tried to destroy the longstanding statutory partnership ("Federal State Partnership") between the National Endowment for Humanities ("NEH") and fifty-six state and jurisdictional humanities councils (the "Councils") by terminating all grants to the Councils while simultaneously dismantling the agency, including the very office designed to support the Federal State Partnership.

evidence.text: On May 15, 2025, Plaintiffs filed this lawsuit.
